H0.text: The speed of the car must equal zero if a car is moving at a constant rate along a straight line.

H1.text: The direction of the car must equal zero if a car is moving at a constant rate along a straight line.

H2.text: Energy of the car must equal zero if a car is moving at a constant rate along a straight line.

H3.text: Acceleration of the car must equal zero if a car is moving at a constant rate along a straight line.

A5.text: Uniform or constant acceleration is a type of motion in which the velocity of an object changes by an equal amount in every equal time period.
